title: refunds system
body: is the refund system gonna reset too?

replies.body: Each account is provide 3 refund tokens for items purchased within 90 days, per the [refund ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ)guidelines.  I don't have any information or news on that changing, but any adjustments would be shared on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page.  You can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if your specific issue is outside of that, and we'll be happy to help individually.  I hope that helps!
